SmartCommands
public abstract static class SmartCommands.GuardedDialogInterfaceClickListener
extends SmartCommands.GuardedCommand
implements android.content.DialogInterface.OnClickListener

A DialogInterface.OnClickListener which runs its execution in the low-priority threads pool, and which handles exceptions.

2010.06.08
